title: One AMAZING USB Microphone - HyperX Quadcast
description: The HyperX Quadcast is one of the most anticipated USB streaming microphones announced in the last year.  At $140 it isn't cheap but as you'll hear in this review the sound quality produced by this mic is pretty epic, even when compared against the Blue Yeti series.
